jbittorrent

Interface DownloadManagerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExampleTestClientTorrent

    public interface DownloadManagerListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Listener that manages the events of download finish and the events of swarm updating.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Sandra Ferrer Celma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void downloadComplete()
      Manage download completion event.
      void updatePeerListState(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> mapState, long lastTimeSendPieceBlock, long lastTimeReceivePieceBlock, long initTimeStartedProtocol)
      Updates the state of the peers in the swarm, according to the following parameters: mapState is a map with the keys, complete the number of peers that are seed and incomplete the number of peers that are downloading the file.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadComplete

        void downloadComplete()
        Manage download completion event.

      • updatePeerListState

        void updatePeerListState(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> mapState,
                       long lastTimeSendPieceBlock,
                       long lastTimeReceivePieceBlock,
                       long initTimeStartedProtocol)
        Updates the state of the peers in the swarm, according to the following parameters:
        • mapState is a map with the keys, complete the number of peers that are seed and incomplete the number of peers that are downloading the file.
        • lastTimeSendPieceBlock is the last time that the peer sent a block to other peer.
        • lastTimeReceivePieceBlock : is the last time that the peer received a block from other peer.
        • initTimeStartedProtocol is the moment when starts the process.
        Parameters:
        mapState - Map
        lastTimeSendPieceBlock - long
        lastTimeReceivePieceBlock - long
        initTimeStartedProtocol - long
